$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Add Bookm.caption: Add Bookmark
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Add Bookm.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Add Bookmark
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Add Bookm.text:
\define thisTagSelect() <$select tiddler='$:/state/Bookmarks' field='selected_tag' > <$list filter='[[$:/data/Bookmarks/BookmarkTags]indexes[]regexp:[(?i)$(tagSearch)$]]' > \end <$list filter='[[$:/settings/plugins/Bookmarks]get[tag_used]][[Bookmark]]+[limit[1]]' variable=DefaultTag > URL: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Bookmarks/NewBookmark' field=url class='tc-edit-texteditor' /> Name: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Bookmarks/NewBookmark' field=name class='tc-edit-texteditor' /> Note: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Bookmarks/NewBookmark' field=note class='tc-edit-texteditor' /> Tags (it will always be tagged with <> by default):
<$tiddler tiddler='$:/temp/Bookmarks/NewBookmark' > {{||$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/BookmarksAddTag}} <$button>Add Bookmark <$fieldmangler tiddler='$:/temp/Bookmarks/NewBookmark' > <$action-sendmessage $message='tm-add-tag' $param=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Bookmarks/NewBookmark' $field='title' $value={{$:/temp/Bookmarks/NewBookmark!!name}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Bookmarks/NewBookmark' url='' name='' note='' tags='' />

$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/BookmarkV.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/BookmarkViewTemplate
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/BookmarkV.text:
<$list filter='[[$:/settings/plugins/Bookmarks]get[tag_used]][[Bookmark]]+[limit[1]]' variable=DefaultTag > <$list filter='[is[current]tag]' >
URL Note
<$view field=title /> {{!!note}}

$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.caption: Bookmarks List
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks List
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.text:
\define thisBookmarkList() <$list filter='[tag[Bookmark]regexp[(?i)$(searchString)$]sort[title]]-[[$:/temp/Bookmarks/NewBookmark]]' template='$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/BookmarkDisplayTemplate' > \end Bookmarks: (Narrow List by Name: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Bookmarks/BookmarkList' field=search_text/>)
<$set name=searchString value={{$:/temp/Bookmarks/BookmarkList!!search_text}} > <>

$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.caption: Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.text:
\define thisRemoveTag()
Select Tag:
<$select
    tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks Settings'
    field='edit_tag_list'
>
    <$list
        filter='[[$:/data/Bookmarks/BookmarkTags]indexes[]]'
    >
        <option
            value=<<currentTiddler>>
        >
            <$view
                field='title'
            />
        </option>
    </$list>
</$select>
<$button
    set='$:/data/Bookmarks/BookmarkTags##$(TagToRemove)$'
>
    Remove Tag
</$button>
\end

This removes tags from the list of tags used by bookmarks

<$set
    name=TagToRemove
    value={{$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks Settings!!edit_tag_list}}
>
    <<thisRemoveTag>>
</$set>

You can use this to change the default tag added to your bookmarks. Note that changing this will make it so your existing bookmarks don't show up unless they also have this tag.

Base Tag:
<$edit-text
    tiddler='$:/settings/plugins/Bookmarks'
    field='tag_used'
    placeholder=Bookmarks
    default=Bookmarks
/>

$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.caption: Bookmarks Sorted by Tags
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks by Tags
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.text:
\define thisBookmarksListByTag() <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags' text='' > <$set name=searchSelection value={{$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags}} > <$set name=searchSelection2 value={{$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags2}} > <$set name=searchSelection3 value={{$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags3}} > <$list filter='[[$:/data/Bookmarks/BookmarkTags]indexes[]]' > <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" mode="inline" />
    <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags2' text='' > <$list filter='[tagtagsort[title]regexp[(?i)$(SearchString)$]]' template='$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/BookmarkDisplayTemplate' > <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags2' text='' > <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags3' text='' > <$list filter='[tagtagtagsort[title]regexp[(?i)$(SearchString)$]]' template='$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/BookmarkDisplayTemplate' > <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags3' text='' > <$list filter='[tagtagtagtagsort[title]regexp[(?i)$(SearchString)$]]' template='$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/BookmarkDisplayTemplate' >
<$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags' text='' > <$set name=searchSelection value={{$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags}} > <$list filter='[[$:/data/Bookmarks/BookmarkTags]indexes[]sort[title]]' > <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" mode="inline" />
    <$list filter='[tagtagsort[title]]' template='$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/BookmarkDisplayTemplate' >
\end <$list filter='[[$:/settings/plugins/Bookmarks]get[tag_used]][[Bookmark]]+[limit[1]]' variable=DefaultTag > Select tag to see all bookmarks with that tag:
<$select tiddler='$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags' > <$list filter='[[$:/data/Bookmarks/BookmarkTags]indexes[]sort[title]]' > <$reveal state='$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags' type='nomatch' text='' > <$select tiddler='$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags2' > <$list filter='[tagtag{$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags}tags[]sort[title]]-[]-[{$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags}]' > <$reveal state='$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags2' type='nomatch' text='' > <$select tiddler='$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags3' > <$list filter='[tagtag{$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags}tag{$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags2}tags[]sort[title]]-[]-[{$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags}]-[{$:/state/Bookmarks/BookmarksByTags2}]' > Search: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/state/Bookmarks/Search' field='search'/>
<$set name='SearchString' value={{$:/state/Bookmarks/Search!!search}} > <>

$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.caption: Bookmarks
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.text:
<$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/reveal/Bookmarks/AddBookmark' text='show' > <$button set='$:/state/reveal/Bookmarks/AddBookmark' setTo='hide' > Done
<$transclude tiddler='$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Add Bookmark' /> <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/reveal/Bookmarks/AddBookmark' text='show' > <$button set='$:/state/reveal/Bookmarks/AddBookmark' setTo='show' > New Bookmark <>

$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/BookmarksAddTag
$:/plugins/inmysocks/Bookmarks/Bookmarks.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/EditTemplate/ \define tag-styles() background-color:$(backgroundColor)$; fill:$(foregroundColor)$; color:$(foregroundColor)$; \end \define tag-body-inner(colour,fallbackTarget,colourA,colourB) <$vars foregroundColor=<> backgroundColor="""$colour$"""> > class="tc-tag-label"> <$view field="title" format="text" /> <$button message="tm-remove-tag" param={{!!title}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-remove-tag-button">× \end \define tag-body(colour,palette) <$macrocall $name="tag-body-inner" colour="""$colour$""" fallbackTarget={{$palette$##tag-background}} colourA={{$palette$##foreground}} colourB={{$palette$##background}}/> \end
<$fieldmangler> <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]sort[title]]" storyview="pop"> <$macrocall $name="tag-body" colour={{!!color}} palette={{$:/palette}}/>
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/NewTagName" tag="input" default="" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Tags/Add/Placeholder}} focusPopup=<> class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-popup-handle"/> <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Tags/Dropdown/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Tags/Dropdown/Caption}}>{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$button message="tm-add-tag" param={{$:/temp/NewTagName}} set="$:/temp/NewTagName" setTo="" class="" > <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/data/Bookmarks/BookmarkTags' $index={{$:/temp/NewTagName}} $value=1 /> <>
<$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default="">
<$linkcatcher set="$:/temp/NewTagName" setTo="" message="tm-add-tag"> <$list filter="[[$:/data/Bookmarks/BookmarkTags]indexes[]search:title{$:/temp/NewTagName}sort[]]"> {{||$:/core/ui/Components/tag-link}}
